creator: shianyow@gmail.com

comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:59.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/59.0
Build ID: 20180406121424

Steps to reproduce:

On Linux(Ubuntu 18.04), it's not able to enter password in the login page of https://www.junyiacademy.org/

STR:
1. Connect https://www.junyiacademy.org/
2. Click "登入" (login)
3. Click the field of "密碼" (password)


Actual results:

Unable to change focus to the password field and enter text.


Expected results:

Should be able to enter text in the password field.
comments.author: shianyow@gmail.com

comments.text:
The problem only happens on Linux version. Both Firefox Windows and Chrome browser work fine.

According to mozregression, this is a regression since Firefox 42.

summary: Unable to enter text in <input type=password>
